# Posit Team User Training

::: {.subtitle}
Posit Team is the bundle of our most popular professional products including: Workbench, Connect, and Package Manager. Together, this bundle delivers an end-to-end toolchain for data science teams committed to R and Python, improving every step of a data scientist's workflow: from developing insights, to deploying data products, to managing environments.

Below is a collection of short video tutorials to help data scientists and statistical programmers become familiar with Posit Team and help realize business value quickly with our products. These videos are grouped by topic and designed to be watched in order. If you're ready to start learning how Posit Team can improve your data science workflows, then check out the welcome video below and have fun!
:::
